Text: Save me, O God, by Your name, and vindicate me by Your might.
Context: David is pleading for God’s help, expressing trust in God‘s power to save.

Text: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
Context: David is earnestly asking for God’s attention to his prayer.

Text: For strangers have risen against me, and ruthless men seek my life—men with no regard for God. Selah
Context: David is describing the immediate danger he faces from violent enemies who do not fear God.

Text: Surely God is my helper; the Lord is the sustainer of my soul.
Context: David expresses his confidence that God is on his side, providing support and sustenance.

Text: He will repay my enemies for their evil. In Your faithfulness, destroy them.
Context: David is anticipating divine justice against his enemies, asking God to act because of His faithfulness.

Text: I will sacrifice a freewill offering to You; I will praise Your name, O LORD, for it is good.
Context: David commits to worship and thanksgiving, acknowledging the goodness of God‘s name.

Text: For He has delivered me from all trouble, and my eyes have looked in triumph on my foes.
Context: David celebrates God’s deliverance from his troubles and the defeat of his enemies.
